summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Main Street (now Orcas Street in What is commonly known as Hillman City) from Rainier Boulevard to Bateman Street in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 16870, creating Local Improvement District No. 1581 Prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
